string.value: 추운 겨울 옆구리가 유난히도 시릴 #b가가#k를 찾아가 보자.
가가는 추운날씨에는 빨간 내복이 최고라며 옷감을 준비해 달라고 했다. 옷감은 몬스터들에게서 얻을수 있다고?
빨간색 내복을 입은 가가. 생각만 해도 너무 웃긴걸?
Whoa! It's so cold! I feel like I'm going to freeze! How about you, #b#h0##k?
When the wind chills you like it's doing now, Red Thermals are the best. Just thinking about wearing a soft and warm Red Thermal makes me happy.
I really want to wear some Red Thermals. They are supposed to make you warm as well as stylish! Please gather #b20 #t4032532# so that I can wear some pretty Red Thermals! Thank you!

Yeah! That beautiful red fabric... Exactly what I asked for! Please give it to me and I will give you a Guitar Case that I used to use when I was preparing to become...an idol...when I was younger. You'll find a gift inside the Guitar Case.

If you don't open the Guitar Case, a mysterious energy will transform the Guitar Case into a better one the next day. That Guitar Case will contain an even better gift. \r\nAlso, I need to make many, many thermals so please bring me more fabric every hour.
You didn't find #b20 #t4032532#s#k? You should be able get them while hunting monsters...
